item.title: 3 Nice Garage Records
item.description: No particular order, just three Garage records I think are great. Enjoy! 1. Pied Piper & Unknown MC - Listen 2. Digga - Da Lick 3. Butter - Do Me Right

Lagrangian Neural Networks BibTeX @article{cranmer2020lagrangian, title={Lagrangian neural networks}, author={Cranmer, Miles and Greydanus, Sam and Hoyer, Stephan and Battaglia, Peter and Spergel, David and Ho, Shirley}, journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2003.04630}, year={2020} } Summary Use constraint of EL equations to force NN to conserve energy, leading to NN that can better predict dynamics for physical systems such as double pendulum. Description Lagrangian is paramterised by NN in this case MLP Use vector EL equstions, then apply time derive to get acceleration.
